com.infostretch.labs.transformers

Class Transformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infostretch.labs.transformers.Transformer

  • public class Transformer
extends java.lang.Object
    Transformer class is the main class that handles the conversion of FreeStyle job configuration to pipeline Job configuration.
    Author:
    Mohit Dharamshi

    • Method Detail

      • performFreeStyleTransformation

        public void performFreeStyleTransformation()
        Initialises transformation process of Freestyle project to Pipeline.

      • transformJob

        private void transformJob(hudson.model.FreeStyleProject item,
                          boolean downStream)
        Invokes conversion of given FreeStyle Job. This method is recursively called if downstream jobs are to be converted also.
        Parameters:
        item - FreeStyle job to convert.
        downStream - Boolean to decide if item's downstream jobs are to be converted.

      • getStream

        public java.io.InputStream getStream()
        Returns the input stream which consists of the entire XML structure of the new pipeline job.
        Returns:
        InputStream of XML structure of the new pipeline job.

      • transformFile

        private void transformFile()
        Calls 'copy' or 'transformers' methods of various configurations of a FreeStyle job.

      • transformConfigurations

        private void transformConfigurations(java.util.List<java.lang.String> configurations)
        Calls respective methods that convert configurations.
        Parameters:
        configurations - List of configuration to convert.

      • copyConfigurations

        private void copyConfigurations(java.util.List<java.lang.String> configurations)
        Copies known configurations that are identical in pipeline jobs. Plugins / configurations that cause job creation / build to fail are explicitely to removed.
        Parameters:
        configurations - List of configurations to copy.

      • transformLabel

        private void transformLabel()
        Transforms label to node block.

      • appendToScript

        public void appendToScript(java.lang.String stage,
                           java.lang.String block)
        General method to append script block with a stage wrap.
        Parameters:
        stage - Name of stage to create.
        block - Script block to add under stage.

      • appendToScript

        public void appendToScript(java.lang.String block)
        General method to append script block to main script.
        Parameters:
        block - Script block to add to main script.

      • appendScriptToXML

        private void appendScriptToXML(boolean commitJenkinsfile,
                               java.lang.String commitMessage)
        Add Groovy Script to XML strucuture. If commit to SCM is selected, script is written to Jenkinsfile and committed to SCM.
        Parameters:
        commitJenkinsfile - Boolean to decide if script is to be kept inline or committed as Jenkinsfile to SCM.
        commitMessage - Commit message if Jenkinsfile is to be committed to SCM.

      • getElementByTag

        public org.w3c.dom.Element getElementByTag(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                           java.lang.String tag)
        Gets Element object from Node based on tag name.
        Parameters:
        node - Node object from which element is to be extracted.
        tag - Name of tag to extract.
        Returns:
        Element derived from node by given tag name.

      • writeConfiguration

        private void writeConfiguration()
        Write complete transformed configuration to input stream object.

      • setScmBranch

        public void setScmBranch(java.lang.String scmBranch)
        Setter method to set SCM Branch. Useful when committing Jenkinsfile to SCM.
        Parameters:
        scmBranch - SCM Branch to set for committing Jenkinsfile to SCM.

      • setScmURL

        public void setScmURL(java.lang.String scmURL)
        Setter method to set SCM URL. Useful when committing Jenkinsfile to SCM.
        Parameters:
        scmURL - SCM URL to set for committing Jenkinsfile to SCM.

      • setScmType

        public void setScmType(java.lang.String scmType)
        Setter method to set SCM Type. Useful when committing Jenkinsfile to SCM.
        Parameters:
        scmType - SCM Type to set for committing Jenkinsfile to SCM.

      • setScmCredentialsId
